<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<MPD xmlns="urn:mpeg:dash:schema:mpd:2011" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:mpeg:DASH:schema:MPD:2011 http://standards.iso.org/ittf/PubliclyAvailableStandards/MPEG-DASH_schema_files/DASH-MPD.xsd" xmlns:clearkey="http://dashif.org/guidelines/clearKey" xmlns:cenc="urn:mpeg:cenc:2013" profiles="urn:mpeg:dash:profile:isoff-live:2011" type="static" mediaPresentationDuration="PT47.7S" minBufferTime="PT4S">
  <ProgramInformation></ProgramInformation>
  <Period id="0" start="PT0S">
    <AdaptationSet id="0" contentType="video" lang="eng" segmentAlignment="true" bitstreamSwitching="true">
      <Representation id="0" bandwidth="2750000" width="1152" height="648" frameRate="30000/1001" mimeType="video/mp4" codecs="avc1.64081f">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
      </Representation>

      </Representation>
      <Representation id="2" bandwidth="4000000" width="1280" height="720" frameRate="30000/1001" mimeType="video/mp4" codecs="avc1.64081f">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
      </Representation>
      <Representation id="3" bandwidth="1250000" width="896" height="504" frameRate="30000/1001" mimeType="video/mp4" codecs="avc1.64081f">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
      </Representation>
      <Representation id="4" bandwidth="750000" width="640" height="360" frameRate="30000/1001" mimeType="video/mp4" codecs="avc1.64081e">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
      </Representation>
      <Representation id="5" bandwidth="500000" width="512" height="288" frameRate="30000/1001" mimeType="video/mp4" codecs="avc1.640815">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
      </Representation>
      <ContentProtection schemeIdUri="urn:mpeg:dash:mp4protection:2011" value="cenc" cenc:default_KID="7dc71a33-5dda-101f-90ad-134d207d2b25"></ContentProtection>
      <ContentProtection schemeIdUri="urn:uuid:e2719d58-a985-b3c9-781a-b030af78d30e" value="ClearKey1.0">
        <clearkey:Laurl Lic_type="EME-1.0">key.key</clearkey:Laurl>
      </ContentProtection>
    </AdaptationSet>
    <AdaptationSet id="1" contentType="audio" lang="eng" segmentAlignment="true" bitstreamSwitching="true">
      <Representation id="6" audioSamplingRate="44100" bandwidth="128000" mimeType="audio/mp4" codecs="mp4a.40.2">
        <SegmentTemplate duration="2000000" timescale="1000000" initialization="init_en_US_$RepresentationID$.mp4" media="segment_en_US_$RepresentationID$_$Number$.m4s" startNumber="1"></SegmentTemplate>
        <AudioChannelConfiguration schemeIdUri="urn:mpeg:dash:23003:3:audio_channel_configuration:2011" value="2"></AudioChannelConfiguration>
      </Representation>
      <ContentProtection schemeIdUri="urn:mpeg:dash:mp4protection:2011" value="cenc" cenc:default_KID="7dc71a33-5dda-101f-90ad-134d207d2b25"></ContentProtection>
      <ContentProtection schemeIdUri="urn:uuid:e2719d58-a985-b3c9-781a-b030af78d30e" value="ClearKey1.0">
        <clearkey:Laurl Lic_type="EME-1.0">key.key</clearkey:Laurl>
      </ContentProtection>
    </AdaptationSet>
  </Period>
</MPD>

subtitles:
{"ar":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"‫مرحبًا في صالة تدريب البطل الرياضية"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"‫مستوحاة من "جيم غاما" من My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"‫في أثناء هذا التمرين، سنقوم بتقسيمكم إلى فريقين…
‫فريق ألفا ضد فريق بيتا"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"‫للفوز، يحتاج فريقكم إلى تسجيل إجمالي 100 نقطة"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:16.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","text":"‫يمكنكم تسجيل نقاط بقضاء فريقكم على الخصوم،"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.000000000","text":"‫أو بالاستيلاء على مناطق الإنقاذ التي ستظهر
‫بشكل عشوائي عبر الخريطة."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.500000000","text":"‫اختاروا من بين 3 فئات، لكل منها
‫إحصائياتها ومهاراتها الفريدة: فئة المدافع، والمهاجم، والدعم."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"‫حددوا فئتكم وجهزوها بالعتاد بمجرد دخولكم غرفة
‫الملابس. ولكن لا تقلقوا، يمكنكم دائمًا العودة لتغييرها لاحقًا!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"ستتناوب الساحة بشكل عشوائي بين بيئتين
‫وهما المدينة الحضرية والساحة الأساسية."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"‫المعركة تبدأ. تجاوزوا حدود بلاس ألترا!"}],"de":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Willkommen im Hero Training Gym!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.328000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"Inspiriert vom Gym Gamma aus
My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.562000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.197000000","text":"Bei dieser Übung teilen wir euch
in zwei Teams auf:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.298000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.259000000","text":"Team Alpha und Team Beta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.546000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.366000000","text":"Um zu gewinnen, muss euer Team
insgesamt 100 Punkte erzielen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.421000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.771000000","text":"Ihr erhaltet Punkte, indem ihr
für euer Team Gegner eliminiert"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.833000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.438000000","text":"oder Rettungszonen erobert,
die zufällig auf der Karte erscheinen."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.627000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.619000000","text":"Wählt von drei Klassen mit
einzigartigen Werten und Fertigkeiten:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.711000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.664000000","text":"Spielt als Tank, als Angriffs- 
oder als Unterstützungsklasse."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.754000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.639000000","text":"In der Umkleide wählt ihr
eure Klasse und Ausrüstung."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.748000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.242000000","text":"Ihr könnt dies aber jederzeit
wieder hier ändern!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.402000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.796000000","text":"Die Arena wird zufällig ausgewählt und
ist entweder eine Vorstadt oder eine Basis."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.890000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.656000000","text":"Der Kampf beginnt.
Immer weiter! Plus-Ultra!"}],"en":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Welcome to the Hero Training Gym"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"Inspired by Gym Gamma from My Hero Academia"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"During this exercise. We’ll have you split into two teams… Team Alpha vs Team Beta"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"To win, your team needs to score a total of 100 points"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:16.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","text":"You can score points by eliminating opponents with your team, "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.000000000","text":"Or by capturing rescue zones that will appear randomly across the map. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.500000000","text":"Choose between 3 classes, each with their own unique stats and skills: The Tank, the Assault and the Support class. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"Select your class and loadout once you enter the locker room but don’t worry, you can always come back to change it later!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"The arena will randomly rotate between two environments, Urban City and Base Arena."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"The battle is beginning. Go beyond! Plus Ultra!"}],"es":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.100000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.280000000","text":"Bienvenidos al Entrenamiento de héroes"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"inspirado en el Gimnasio Gamma
de My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.980000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.106000000","text":"En este ejercicio,
os dividiremos en dos equipos:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:09.320000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.220000000","text":"Equipo alfa contra Equipo beta"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.840000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.340000000","text":"Para ganar,
tu equipo tendrá que sumar 100 puntos."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.533000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.746000000","text":"Se consiguen eliminando oponentes
con tu equipo"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.213000000","text":"o capturando zonas de rescate,
que aparecen por el mapa al azar."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.813000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.627000000","text":"Escoge entre tres clases
con estadísticas y habilidades únicas:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.846000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.653000000","text":"tanque, asalto y apoyo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.840000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.647000000","text":"Selecciona tu clase y equipo
al entrar en la taquilla."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.786000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.166000000","text":"No te preocupes,
se pueden cambiar más adelante."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.626000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.593000000","text":"La arena rotará al azar entre dos entornos:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.873000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.673000000","text":"la zona urbana y la arena base."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.526000000","text":"La batalla comienza.
¡Ve más allá! ¡Plus Ultra!"}],"es-419":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.113000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Bienvenidos al Gimnasio de entrenamiento 
de héroes,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"inspirado en el Gimnasio Gamma
de My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"Los dividiremos en dos equipos:
equipo alfa contra equipo beta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"Para ganar, tu equipo tiene que conseguir
100 puntos."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.585000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.833000000","text":"Puedes conseguir puntos eliminando
oponentes con tu equipo"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.019000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.138000000","text":"o capturando zonas de rescate que 
aparecerán al azar por todo el mapa."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.526000000","text":"Elige entre 3 clases, cada una con
estadísticas y habilidades únicas:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.903000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.246000000","text":"tanque, asalto y apoyo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.813000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.506000000","text":"Elige tu clase y arsenal cuando entres
al vestuario."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.696000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.243000000","text":"Pero no te preocupes: siempre puedes
volver más tarde para cambiarlo."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.652000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.552000000","text":"La arena cambiará aleatoriamente
entre dos entornos:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.736000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.736000000","text":"ciudad urbana y arena básica."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:42.280000000","text":"La batalla está empezando."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:42.400000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.304000000","text":"¡Supera tus límites! ¡Plus Ultra!"}],"fr":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Voici le Terrain d'entraînement de héros,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"inspiré du gymnase Gamma
de My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.800000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.200000000","text":"Vous serez répartis en deux équipes :
l'équipe Alpha contre l'équipe Bêta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.800000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.300000000","text":"L'équipe qui obtient 100 points l'emporte."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.700000000","text":"Vous gagnez des points
en éliminant vos adversaires"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.900000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.200000000","text":"ou en capturant
des zones de sauvetage sur la carte."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.600000000","text":"Choisissez parmi 3 classes différentes :
tank, combattant et soutien."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.805000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.525000000","text":"Choisissez une classe
et un équipement dans le vestiaire."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.749000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.149000000","text":"Vous pourrez toujours
les changer par la suite."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.600000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.600000000","text":"L'arène a deux variantes :
Zone urbaine et Gymnase."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"Que la bataille commence.
Plus Ultra !"}],"it":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Benvenuti alla Palestra Addestramento Eroe"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"ispirata alla palestra Gamma
di My Hero Academia."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"Durante questo esercizio, vi divideremo
in due squadre: squadra Alfa e squadra Beta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"Per vincere, la tua squadra
dovrà totalizzare 100 punti."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:16.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","text":"Per raccogliere punti con la tua squadra
puoi eliminare avversari"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.000000000","text":"o conquistare le zone di soccorso
che appariranno in punti casuali della mappa. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.500000000","text":"Scegli fra tre classi, ciascuna con statistiche
e abilità uniche: Tank, Assaltatore e Supporto. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"Selezionerai classe e set equipaggiamento all'entrata
dell'armadietto, ma potrai sempre cambiarli più tardi!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"L'arena alternerà due ambienti
in maniera casuale: Cittadina urbana e Arena base."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"La battaglia sta per cominciare!
Sempre oltre il limite! Plus Ultra!"}],"ja":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.078000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.278000000","text":"僕のヒーローアカデミアの体育館γに――"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.328000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"着想を得た
ヒーロートレーニングジムにようこそ"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.820000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.349000000","text":"この訓練では――"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:07.474000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.201000000","text":"チームアルファとチームベータの
2つのチームに分かれて競い合うぞ"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.786000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.255000000","text":"勝利するには
チームで合計100ポイントを獲得しよう"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.505000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.833000000","text":"チームで協力して敵を撃破するか――"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.927000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.396000000","text":"マップ内にランダムで出現する
救出ゾーンを確保するとポイントが手に入る"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.724000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.646000000","text":"能力値とスキルがそれぞれ異なる
3つのクラスから選択しよう"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.708000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.724000000","text":"「タンク」「アサルト」「サポート」がある"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.833000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.568000000","text":"更衣室に入ったら
クラスとロードアウトを選択しよう"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.763000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.271000000","text":"心配は無用だ！
後で戻ってきて いつでも変更できるぞ"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.614000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.666000000","text":"アリーナでは2つの環境がランダムに入れ替わる"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:38.835000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.726000000","text":"市街地とベースアリーナだ"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.492000000","text":"戦いが始まる
更に向こうへ！ PLUS ULTRA！"}],"ko":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"히어로 훈련 체육관에 오신 것을 환영합니다"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"나의 히어로 아카데미아의 체육관 감마를 본떴죠"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"이번 훈련에서는 팀 알파 vs 팀 베타 두 팀으로 나뉩니다"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.906000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.406000000","text":"팀 점수 총 100점이 되면 승리합니다"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.765000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.765000000","text":"점수는 팀과 함께 적을 처치하거나"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.018000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:21.518000000","text":"맵에 무작위로 나타나는 구출 구역을 점령해서 얻습니다"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.833000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.333000000","text":"고유 능력치와 스킬을 지닌 3가지 클래스 '탱커', '공격', '지원' 중 선택하세요"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"라커룸에서 클래스와 편성을 선택하세요. 나중에 언제든 돌아와 바꿀 수 있습니다!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"아레나는 시가지와 베이스 아레나의 2가지 환경 중 무작위로 선택됩니다"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"전투가 시작됩니다. 더 먼 곳으로! 플러스 울트라!"}],"pl":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.375000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.304000000","text":"Witamy w Sali treningowej bohaterów."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.656000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"Została ona zainspirowana Salą Gamma
z My Hero Academia"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:08.738000000","text":"W tym ćwiczeniu
podzielimy graczy na dwa zespoły."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:08.762000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"Drużyna Alfa kontra Drużyna Beta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"By wygrać, twoja drużyna
musi zdobyć łącznie 100 punktów."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.636000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.893000000","text":"Członkowie drużyny zdobywają punkty,
likwidując przeciwników"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.976000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.362000000","text":"lub przejmując strefy ratunkowe,
które pojawią się na mapie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:26.859000000","text":"Wybieraj spośród 3 klas
o wyjątkowych statystykach i zdolnościach:"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:27.007000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.475000000","text":"Tank, Natarcie i Wsparcie."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.921000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.738000000","text":"Wybierz klasę i wyposażenie,
gdy trafisz do szatni."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:32.818000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.429000000","text":"Ale bez obaw –
zawsze możesz wrócić i je zmienić!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.909000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"Środowiska na arenie rotują losowo
między Strefą miejską i Podstawową areną."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"Bitwa się zaczyna.
Jeszcze dalej! Plus Ultra!"}],"pt-br":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Boas-vindas à Academia de Treinamento de Herói"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"Inspirada Academia Gamma, de My Hero Academia"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"Durante esse exercício, vocês serão divididos em duas equipes: Alfa x Beta."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"Para vencer, sua equipe precisa atingir 100 pontos primeiro."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:16.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","text":"Você ganha pontos eliminando oponentes com sua equipe "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.000000000","text":"ou capturando áreas de resgate que aparecem aleatoriamente no mapa. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.500000000","text":"Escolha entre 3 classes, cada uma com atributos e habilidades únicos: Tanque, Ataque e Suporte. "},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"Escolha sua classe e seu conjunto inicial ao entrar no vestiário. Não se preocupe, você poderá voltar e mudar sua escolha depois!"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"A arena alternará aleatoriamente entre dois ambientes: cidade e arena-base."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"A batalha está começando. Vá além! Plus Ultra!"}],"ru":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.200000000","text":"Добро пожаловать на остров «Спортзал героев»,"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.700000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.500000000","text":"созданный по мотивам полигона «Гамма» из манги «Моя геройская академия»."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:06.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.500000000","text":"Для этого упражнения мы поделим вас на две команды: «Альфа» и «Бета»."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:12.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.500000000","text":"Для победы вашей команде нужно набрать 100 очков."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:16.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.000000000","text":"Чтобы получить очки, устраняйте игроков из вражеской команды"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:19.500000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.000000000","text":"или захватывайте зоны спасения, которые будут появляться на карте."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:23.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.500000000","text":"Вам будет доступно три класса с уникальными характеристиками и навыками: «танк», «нападение» и «поддержка»."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:30.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.500000000","text":"Класс и снаряжение можно будет выбрать в раздевалке, однако вы всегда сможете изменить свой выбор."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:36.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.500000000","text":"Карта для арены будет подбираться случайным образом; доступно две карты: городской район и база."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.500000000","text":"Битва начинается. Выйдите за рамки! Дальше — больше!"}],"tr":[{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:00.281000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.179000000","text":"Kahraman Spor Salonu'na hoş geldin."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:02.629000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.543000000","text":"My Hero Academia'daki
Gama Salonu'ndan esinlenilmiştir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:05.914000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.414000000","text":"Bu antrenmanda sizi Alfa Takımı ve Beta Takımı olarak
 iki gruba ayıracağız."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:11.843000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.343000000","text":"Kazanmak için
takımının toplam 100 puan kazanması gerek."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:15.539000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.801000000","text":"Puan kazanmak için takımınla rakipleri avlayabilir"},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:18.968000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.346000000","text":"veya haritada rastgele ortaya çıkan
kurtarma bölgelerini ele geçirebilirsin."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:22.804000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.661000000","text":"Her birinin kendine ait eşsiz özellikleri bulunan
Tank, Saldırı ve Destek sınıflarından birini seç."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:29.812000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.312000000","text":"Soyunma odasında sınıfını ve dizilimini seç.
Ancak endişelenme, sonra tekrar değiştirebilirsin."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:35.617000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:40.740000000","text":"Arena, Şehir ve Üs Arenaları
arasında rastgele değişir."},{"startTime":"+00000000.00:00:41.000000000","endTime":"+00000000.00:00:44.593000000","text":"Savaş başlıyor.
Daha da ötesine. Plus Ultra!"}]}
